TURING MACHINE

D = SCALE IN SEMITONES
PARAM = CHANCE OF CHANGE
IN1 IS CLOCK OR USE METRONOME
TR1 IS CLOCK OUT
TR2 IS PULSE OUT

CHANGE P.L FOR OTHER PATTERN
LENGTHS.



#1
X 0; P.NEXT
L 0 7: SCRIPT 2
X SCALE 0 98 0 D X
SCRIPT 3

#2
J P % + P.I I P.L
K PN 4 I
X + X * J K

#3
CV 1 N X
TR.P 1
IF P.HERE: TR.P 2
J LT RND 100 PARAM
IF J: P.HERE TOSS

#4

#5

#6

#7

#8

#M
SCRIPT 1

#I
PARAM.SCALE 0 100
D 36; P.L 16
L 0 2: PN.I I 0
M 660
M.ACT 0

#P
16	16	16	8
1	1	1	1
0	0	0	0
63	63	63	63
